title: How does a college student handle a full-time course load during the COVID-19 Pandemic when most in-person resources are closed off? - Quora

response.answer_text: Most of the in-person resources are still available! Tutoring? Check! Counseling? Check! Library? Check! Career center? Check! Co-curricular and extracurricular activities? Check! The major issue is inertia. You will not be surrounded by peers who are going to do things. Students will have to take the initiative, but not monstrously so. I know my school and department are aggressively promoting all of the clubs and groups that are attached to us. We are pushing students toward tutoring, too. It’s business as usual if you care to succeed.
